summary: Diff introduces shared frontend utility logic to compute (a) due/pending reviews for a selected date (including overdue carry-over, excluding completed) and (b) planned calendar items, and wires this shared logic into TodayView and (at least partially shown) CalendarView to align counts/definitions.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/mentioned a new React Query hook `useGetSubTopicsForDate` for fetching subtopics due on or before a selected date.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to align CalendarView and TodayView counts/labels using a consistent due/pending definition; it does not request adding a new data-fetching hook.
